Mod.name: Poly-Safe Allies Fix
Mod.description:
Allies won't target you when you're polymorphed. Probably. I almost never use allies since they're going to try their hardest to kill me if I get polymorphed... This mod fixes that! But beware, you are still vulnerable to friendly-fire! It works by applying a temporary invisible pheromone effect to the player whenever they're polymorphed, so it should work with all modded allies and poly effects.
Untested in multiplayer, but it should probably work.
